channel.title: 'General Discussion' - pfft
channel.description:
What's happened to the general discussion forum? Since when is it a graphics design community forum or a forum for idiots attempting to make lame jokes? And also while I'm ranting there should be a limit on the 'development team' forum. It's full of useless crap where over 50% of the topics are locked because someone is looking for a 'coder'.
Post what you think.

My bad, lock this if you want mods.
